alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Orleans; Plaquemines; St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 10:30PM CDT until June 04 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central St. Bernard Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Orleans Parish in southeastern Louisiana... North central Jefferson Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Plaquemines Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1030 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arabi, or near Chalmette, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Chalmette, Marrero, Harvey, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Avondale, Jefferson, Gretna, Westwego, Terrytown, Bridge City, Arabi, Woodmere and Lakefront Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 232 and 244. Interstate 510 near mile marker 3. Interstate 610 between mile markers 2 and 4. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
